column1: The funeral service will be held at 11 a.m.
column5: at Colonial Funeral Home Chapel with Reverend Craig M. Toth officiating. Interment will follow in Mt. Zion United Methodist Church cemetery.  The family will receive friends from 6 until 8 p.m.
column7: at Colonial Funeral Home. Memorials may be made to Rockingham County Humane Society
